newsitem.title: USA: Tri Polyta ends at 8-3/4 in New York.
newsitem.headline: Tri Polyta ends at 8-3/4 in New York.

text.p: PT Tri Polyta Indonesia closed at 8-3/4 in New York on Monday. It recorded the day's high of 9-1/8 and the day's low 8-5/8.
Its previous close on Friday was 9.
Volume on Monday was 18,800 American Depository Shares (ADS). Block volume was nil.
